meanings.definition: Dice: plural form of die, a small cube with each side having a different number of spots from one to six, used in games of chance
meanings.sent1: I rolled the dices and got a six.
meanings.sent2: Let's play a game with these dices.
meanings.sent3: The dices decided who would go first in the game.
meanings.sent4: The outcome of the game was determined by the roll of the dices.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the dices hitting the table filled the room.

meanings.definition: Dice: to cut into small cubes
meanings.sent1: She dices the vegetables for the salad.
meanings.sent2: The chef dices the onions quickly.
meanings.sent3: He dices the meat with precision, like a master chef.
meanings.sent4: The knife dices through the ingredients effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: Dicing the fruits makes the dish look more appealing.

meanings.definition: Dice: to play or gamble with dice
meanings.sent1: We like to dice during our game nights.
meanings.sent2: They dices for fun at the casino.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to dice for who would buy dinner.
meanings.sent4: She dices with luck on her side every time.
meanings.sent5: Dicing adds an element of chance to the game.
